sentences.sContent: One medium oyster provides nearly all of the zinc you need for a day.
sentences.sContent_eng: One medium oyster provides nearly all of the zinc you need for a day.
sentences.sCn: 一个中等大小的牡蛎几乎可以提供给你一天所需的所有锌。

sentences.sContent: Abstr: In zinc extraction process, fluorine and chlorine, leached into the solution, affect the normal operation of electrolysis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abstr: In zinc extraction process, fluorine and chlorine, leached into the solution, affect the normal operation of electrolysis.
sentences.sCn: 文章摘要： 湿法锌冶炼中，随浸出进入系统的氟、氯离子影响电解的正常进行。

trans.tranOther: a blue-white metal that is used to make brass and to cover and protect objects made of iron. It is a chemical element: symbol Zn
